ygData.subject: RE: My Experience With a Level 2 Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: i dont know about you, but I m a cleric of Mithaniel Marr, I ve got 136 wisdom (higher than some dwarves I know) and using Greater healing (300 hps) takes one
ygData.messageBody:
i dont know about you, but I'm a cleric of Mithaniel Marr, I've got 136
wisdom (higher than some dwarves I know) and using Greater healing (300 hps)
takes one bub of mana at 24. If I remove all my EQ....i LOSE one bub of
mana also. I figure I'd be using about 1 and 1/2 mana if I didnt have my eq
on....so I'd say up your wisdom, and mention that if your trying to heal a
tank who's 3-5 levels greater than you...WITHOUT greater healing....good
luck. With normal healing, at lvl 23, using on a tank within my lvl
range...I'd always heal 1 bub of health. Greater i can usually do 1/3 AT
LEAST of his health. That's a pretty decent amount...especially if the tank
is a bard. (who has less hps than a warrior) I wait till they hit 3 bubs
of health gone and wham....its right back....they cant beleive it.
Wizards....1 bub of health to full or almost full and they LOVE you.


Bann Sidhe

24th lvl cleric, Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: bigmack [mailto:bigmack@...]
Sent: Sunday, August 22, 1999 6:45 PM
To: EQ-clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] My Experience With a Level 2 Cleric


I just created a Cleric today and got him up to level 2. At the guild
shop I noticed so many classes of spells...attack spells, healings spells,
and other spells were all handled by different NPC's. I'll be spending A
LOT of money on spells. I do have a minor gripe with clerics, though. They
just don't have enough total mana, and the Minor Healing spell isn't strong
enough. I was grouped up with a Warrior and after wasting all of my mana
healing him four times, only half of his health had grown back. Clerics
need more mana! What do you think?

Albus the Cleric, on The Tribunal Server
